title: Pursuit
description: Overview:CIA operative Paul Cook was trying to leave his past behind. Then a desperate and frightened girl travels to Portugal to meet with him, a girl with ties to his past. She begs Paul Cook to return to Africa to find the man she loves, a man believed to be dead. Heâ€™s reluctant even when she shows him a priceless sapphire as proof that her man is alive, but then the man on the beach changes all of that.
author: Roger Weston
